This command consists of multiple subcommands to interact with ritchie.

It can be used to list repositories, credentials, workspaces, or formulas.

Examples:
rit list repo, rit list credential, rit list workspace, rit list formula

Available Commands:
  credential  List credentials fields and part of values
  formula     Show a list with available formulas from a specific repository
  repo        Show a list with all your available repositories
  workspace   Show a list with all your available workspaces

Use "rit <command> --help" for more information about a given command.
